data.title: Testimonials
data.text:
Darcy Kigenza

Ashish Chadha and team were instrumental in us getting permanent residency. Before coming to Elite Overseas Immigration, we had tried (and failed) to complete the process ourselves. We were down on our luck, but Ashish made a stressful and complicated process a lot easier with his knowledge, guidance and understanding. Him and his team were easy to talk to, eager to help and professional throughout. Thank you Ashish & team! We will be recommending you to anyone who asks.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Harpreet Singh

"Big thanks to Elite Overseas, Ashish sir and the team. After 6 month of getting a work permit, I was still undecided on how to get started on my permanent resident application. Ashish sir guided me with the procedure, step by step and kept me updated through the whole process. Today, I am not only a permanent resident of Canada but I also have a reputed and well paid job."

Now a Permanent Resident of Canada

Hoang Dieu Nguyen

My name is Hoang Dieu Nguyen, one of clients of Elite Overseas Immigration Consulting last year. I would like to thank Ashish Chadcha and his team. They worked professionally to help me obtain permanent residence quickly. Their attitudes to clients are friendly, respectful, and trustful. In my experience, clients who come to his consulting always receive help and proper advice. I also believe that who trust in his consulting and advice will receive excellent consequence. If anyone asks me about Elite Overseas Immigration Consulting, I strongly testify that they have always done great job. Trusting them, your dream will become true.

Hoang Dieu Nguyen

Pradeep Singh

I wanna tell you all here Elite immigration provides amazing services and the best part everything is as clear as crystal (Authentic). Ashish would suggest you to do email conversation that way both parties have the evidence of the conversation leaves no room of things going sideways. when I met him first he told me to do all the conversation via email at that moment I was like here’s my deposit and I will get the documentation over to you in a day or so to start the application. He’s very good with the process and knows what he’s doing. I would highly recommend Elite Immigration/Ashish to everyone.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Shashi & Shraddha

We would take this opportunity to thanks Mr. Ashish Chadha and Elite Overseas Immigration Service Team for their invaluable support and guidance from beginning to end. Ashish had handled our case with great care particularly getting the spousal work permit even after few visa refusals and finally getting the PR for both in a very smooth and efficient way. I would strongly recommend Ashish and his team would be best bet to anyone looking for reliable and professional services. Once again big thanks to Ashish and his team for the great service and wish them luck in the future.

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Rohit Michael Magima

I would like to thank Ashish and his team for helping me with my application. It took a lot of patience, and Ashish's expertise helped ease through the long Permanent residency process. Ashish got back on time with my queries and was quick to check supporting documents. Every time I interacted with Ashish he was helpful and professional. This whole process took close to two years and I have only visited his office once. Booking appointments for phone and Skype conversations helped work around both our schedules. Thank you once again to the entire team of Elite Immigration Services!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Salma and Ameerusman

We take this opportunity to thank you Mr.Ashish and entire Elite Overseas team so deeply for our PR success. We are so fortunate that we did our filing through Elite Overseas. Our case was bit complicated and there was time we thought we will not be able to go through, but Ashish always gave us right advice and made every possible way to make our case success. He is always available and very prompt in replying emails, phone calls and text messages. Though I have met him only once during our entire case, we never felt any uncomfortable. He always treated us as a close family. We made our Canadian dream come true following his advices. We are 100% confident to refer him to anybody who needs help in their immigration. Thank you so much Ashish for all your support and guidance. We are extremely happy and satisfied on your service.

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Krunalkumar

Thank you, Elite Overseas Immigration team for all the help since last few years. You have helped me and my wife to become permanent resident of Canada and all the credit goes to you. Mr. Ashish is running the business with good attitude and advice we can trust on. Without his help, I could never have enough time to do all this. You are reliable, and services are managed well at very reasonable prices, plus you never pressure client to win business. I highly advocate Elite Overseas Immigration Services.

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Marc, Laila and Kenichi

We want to say thank-you to Ashish and his team at ELITE OVERSEAS SERVICES LTD for their dedication and hard work to manage and direct our applications for Permanent Resident for Laila and Kenichi. Because of their expertise and guidance, the applications forms and process were done orderly and properly. We dealt directly with Ashish and no one else and he did all the required communications with Immigration. In all, a job very well done by experts who know their job. Thank-you again Ashish and your team.

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Ricardo & Kristina

We would like to thank the whole team of Elite Overseas Immigration Services for helping us with my wife’s permanent residency process. We knew this could be a very long stressing process but Ashish and his team made it easy, reasonably fast and very smooth by handling all the application and communication in our behalf to immigration Canada. The service was always kind, very helpful and made me feel comfortable enough to ask any question in regards to the process. Please feel free to contact Ashish, it worked out for us and we are very thankful for it. Once again, thank you very much for your help and services Elite Overseas Immigration Services!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Catherine Munisi

I knew to get my permanent residency was not going to be easy as I began the process two years ago. Within those two years, I worked with the team for the first year without even meeting them face to face but the process was conducted soo smoothly through skype, emails, and phone calls. I read the testimonies and made the decision for them to be my consultant and I have never regretted. Best decision I made! Elite Immigration is very meticulous and they explained each and every step with a clear understanding of what is required from me and what they will get done. All documentation was sent for my review before they were submitted and followup was done promptly. I am very grateful for all the efforts they have done and most of all working past all the obstacles that came our way.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Corry Hall & Harley Bondini

Getting Permanent Residency was an easy and stress free process with Ashish helping us. We were nervous to apply for Permanent Residency because we heard so many scary stories but the application went so smoothly thanks to Ashish and his team. Ashish made it very simple by telling us exactly what we needed to provide him with and communicating with the Canadian Government on our behalf. He was also able to get us a Bridging Visa so that we could continue to work throughout the process. He answered all of the questions that we had from the beginning to the very end. We are extremely thankful for the help and service that he provided to us!

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Luke and Laila Ford

Ashish and the Elite Overseas team have been an absolute pleasure to work with on our work visas and permanent residency applications. Both myself and my wife are foreign workers in Canada thanks to the hard working and friendly staff. Not only did they make the whole process simple, they were transparent throughout, answering all questions and concerns with expert advise. We would encourage anyone who needs immigration help to use Elite Overseas Immigration. Thanks for all your help.

Elite's client

Sujoy

Ashish Chadha has been helpful in my journey to become a Canadian Permanent Resident. He first helped me in getting me post grad work permit when all hopes were lost after rejection of post grad work permits in Vancouver from private university to getting the permanent residency in Canada. There were setbacks like my bridging work permit didn’t got through as I got my invitation after my expiration of work permit but that was a blessing in disguise cause by that time most of my paperwork was done and I was happy to go visit family at home and spend some time with them also travel a bit. Ashish suggested me to stay calm as we will go through and eventually we did.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Nalin

Mr. Ashish has been a great support and guidance for me all throughout the PR process which took about 15 months, we would have hardly met 3-4 times in person and mostly we talked through emails. He gave me the right suggestions all throughout the process and was very proactive with all the emails. I am very happy to be a permanent resident of Canada today and I would like to thank Mr. Ashish Chadha and his team for bringing me here

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Natasha, Gary, Khensani and Kharyssa Poyser

We would like to express our gratitude to Ashish and the Elite Immigration team. They were very professional in dealing with my family. On a personal note, Ashish is reliable and cares about his client's well-being. He helped my family achieve our goal, that of getting our permanent residence. Ashish has given us a different perspective of immigration consultancy agencies. Your service was a positive one compares to the many negative immigration stories. You are the best that immigrants chasing their dreams could find. We are forever grateful and will not hesitate to recommend you to our family and friends. Kudos to Ashish and the Elite Immigration team for their hard work in helping us to achieve this milestone.

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Irina and Sergei

We have become Permanent Residents of Canada now and would like to say big THANK YOU to Mr. Ashish Chadha and his team for all the help, support and guidance through this important process. Demonstrated confidence, exceptional professionalism, knowledge of all the nuances and careful attention to details made the process absolutely seamless. We appreciate prompt response to our questions, regular updates on the case and proactive actions taken as needed. We highly recommend Elite Overseas Services to anyone who is looking for reliable immigration service. Thank you, Mr.Ashish! All the best wishes!

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Adeeb & Suhita

We just want to express our gratitude and thank Mr. Ashish Chadha for all the crazy hours of effort and outstanding service to help us through the immigration ordeal. Being the impatient person that I am , constantly being positive and supporting me through the whole process. We would rate him the best for his communication skills. Elite’s team is amazing with follow-ups and correspondence. Ashish makes sure that every piece of document and information is verified and scrutinized. Overall – our experience was absolutely hassle free and such a seamless process – we did not have to worry about anything. Thank you Ashish & Elite Immigration’s team – we highly highly recommend your super-fantabulous services. Lots of best wishes .

Now Permanent Residents of Canada

Amanpreet Singh

I am a proud Permanent Resident of Canada now and for that I would like to thank Ashish and his team for doing an excellent job. Not only he helped with my application but also motivated me to look for better job opportunities.I believe this is the most important process of one’s life and should be dealt by a professional so that success is assured. Ashish is a very good listener, vastly experienced, reliable and honest person who keeps everything transparent during entire application process. We met only twice throughout the process but I was kept in the loop with all updates and notifications. His service is very quick and efficient and all my queries were always answered within 24 hours. I would highly recommend them to anyone who is looking for reliable and transparent immigration related services. Thank you Elite Immigration services for making my this dream come true in such a short span of time!!!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Toyosi Fadare

I just want to thank Ashish and his team for helping me with my Permanent Residency case. To be honest, there were times I just wanted my case over and done with because of how complicated the system is, the rules keep changing (which is why I'm glad I didn't do this myself) but Ashish took his time to explain the process and my application didn't take as long as I thought it would. Most of our communication was through emails, we only met a few times but each process was smooth. My advice to anyone in the system or just starting out would be: Take your time, do your research, trust God and don't make your case bigger than it really is.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Jocelyn Lao

I got my Permanent Residency recently thanks to Ashish Chadha and his team. I was refused for my work-permit extension with is why I have to go back to my home country, Philippines. Ashish never gave up on my case and he was confident of bringing me back again. After his continuous efforts, I returned back to Canada and got my work permit. Now, I am Permanent Resident and my family is also here with me from the Philippines and we are celebrating our first Christmas together. Thanks to Elite Overseas! All staff are dedicated and patience in dealing with me, so I highly recommend Elite Overseas Services. Merry Christmas Elite Overseas!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Denys Rudchenko

I would like to thank you Mr. Ashish Chadha and his team at Elite Overseas Immigration Services. It has been a pleasure working and taking immigration services from such as experienced and knowledgeable professional. The service its self is very flexible and constantly updates you with your ongoing immigration status of PR, which gives you peace of mind regarding the progress and going in the right direction. Therefore, I want strongly suggest Elite Overseas Immigration Services, and without any hesitate everyone can take a service with a trust. I want to say once again thank you for your services and business. Best Regards.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Justin

I am grateful to Elite Overseas Team and Ashish who helped me in my Permanent Residence Case. Finally, I got my PR and very happy, although my case was hard, Ashish has tried everything that he could do and made it work. At the same time, the work with Ashish has given me very high confidence in my life since now I am a permanent resident. Thank you very much Ashish and Elite Overseas team members.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Vaibhav Khanna

A very Big Thanks to Mr. Ashish Chadha and his team for providing such a great service throughout the process of my Permanent Residency. There were times when the situations were too critical to handle but with the support, confidence and professional expertise of Elite Overseas Immigration each step turned successful. Though I just met Mr. Ashish few times in this entire process and all our discussions were on mails, but the entire process was really smooth and efficient. I will highly recommend Elite Overseas Immigration to anyone who needs help and is looking for expertise in Immigration concerns.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Ekaterina Shopenko

I would like to thank Ashish and his team for helping me to get my Permanent Residence in Canada!! Once we started working together, I knew he will help me to reach my goal. Ashish right away set up a plan of actions, step by step explained the procedures, and kept me updated through the entire process. I am so happy I got a chance to go with him through this not easy period, but he tried to make it pleasant and almost stress free! I would not be able to do it without him! Thank you so much again! I am the happiest.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Manu Goyal

I'm glad that I made the right decision when I hired Mr. Ashish Chadha as my representative for my permanent resident application. I was misguided by another lawyer due to that I was bit confused about where to go and what to do, because I never wanted to take risk of applying on my own. So I came here at Elite Immigration office and had conversation with Mr. Chadha. He ensured me that I'll be guided properly through out the process. My work permit's validity was only for 5 more months and without giving a second thought I asked Mr. Chadha to start the process. And I'm so grateful to him for his service. Each and every time he was there to clear all the doubts and communication was never been a problem. He used to call back soon as the same day. His way of working is very organized and he always keep patience, focusing on the best results. He kept me updated with my application status. And another best thing was, he made payments easier. I was totally stress free, through out the process and I had firm belief that he will definitely make it to the end. In the future if I have to apply for my family, I know whom to consult with.:) Thank you Sir!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Fe Trecia Maclang

I have been in Canada for Years and ever since I met Ashish, he has been my consultant help. Specially, in times of trouble. He has been parient enough to guide me until I am able to get my Permanent Residence and I am more than happy to say that my family will be with me soon. Thank you so much for all your hard work and please continue to help others to fulfill their dreams, just like mine.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Praveen Nair & Deena Soman

Thank you Mr Ashish and Elite overseas staff for all your guidance and support to help me and my wife for getting the permanent residency in Canada. It was an excellent professional client service experience starting from my BC PNP application, helping me and my wife to be together in Canada within 4 months after wedding by getting work permit for my wife and also saving our precious time in life by including my wife in the ongoing pr application. During the whole process, Ashish and his staff was very proactive, quickly reachable and supportive. I am happy to recommend Elite overseas immigration to anyone who need the immigration service.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Kamrun Dalia & Anisul Hoque

Ashish & Elite Oversease was our life saver when we thought all doors were shutting on us. Ashish, we can never thank you enough for all the work you have done for us along the way in fulfilling our dream of becoming Permanent Residents of Canada. Our utmost gratitude for your patience and standing beside us through all our stress and anxiety, even if it would wake you up in the middle of the nights. :) :) :) :) You were not only our consultant, but also our friend, guide and an advisor for any immigration related & unrelated matters. Love all of you guys @ Elite Overseas.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Tanya Sehgal

Very pleased I chose to go with Elite Overseas Services Ltd. for my Permanent Residency. The best part about working with Ashish Chadha is that I always felt that he was just an email away and I never had to send a reminder for anything to him. No matter how long my emails or how repetitive my questions were, Ashish always answered them with patience and kindness. He was wonderful, helping me throughout this process. I highly recommend using Elite Overseas Services Ltd., their knowledge and understanding of the system is wonderful and took all the stress out of the process. Thank you for everything!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Boris

Big thanks to Elite Overseas Services and mr. Ashish Chadha in particular for the help and guidance on the way to becoming permanent resident. With their help I was able to go through quick and efficient process of getting my permanent residency even though I thought that all hope was lost due to the immigration program I was aiming for being shut indefinitely by CIC at that time. Mr. Ashish Chadha and his team were able to advice, guide and give a little push to me when needed throughout the whole process accommodating my work and life schedule and respecting my time. Would recommend to a friend at first opportunity.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Arshi Mangat

I would like to thank Mr Ashish Chadha and his whole team for supporting me in getting my PR. He and his team are highly professional and patient in answering all the questions and queries at any time of the day. All my doubts were cleared along the way and was advised what was best for me. I being a last minute person, Ashish sir made sure everything was done on time and made the whole process seem easy. I would definitely recommend Elite Overseas Services LTD. Thank you sir for making me feel as family and encouraging along the way. Thank you!

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Natasha D’Souza

Ashish has been one of the few individuals I have met who is passionate, dedicated and very patient in his line of work. Obtaining my study permit was proving to be a challenge but Ashish was determined and very encouraging throughout the process. His professional guidance and vision helped me obtain my study permit. I look forward to pursuing my higher education in Vancouver shortly! Much praises to him and I would definitely recommend him. Thank you once again, I received my passport and visa today! :)

Elite's client

Param

I was extremely disheartened when I saw the refusal letter from CIC for my work permit, partly because I had never heard of such a situation before and partly because I was not ready to leave Canada yet. I turned to Elite Immigration because I knew if there's anyone who can get my permit approved is Mr. Ashish Chadha. His knowledge about workings of CIC and all immigration rules is just top notch! I would highly recommend Elite Immigration to anyone who is facing issues with any kind of immigration matters. Service is courteous and professional. Employees are very approachable. Most of all, you can trust them to get the job done. I know who I'll go to for my PR application now :)

Elite's client

Sujoy Dey

So I graduated from a really good visual effects school in vancouver but unfortunately all the private school work permits were getting rejected. Some of my friends went back but I kept on trying and trying then one of my friend told me about Ashish Chadha as he helped him in getting his work permit aswell. I got in touch with Ashish and he was very professional about how we are about to address this situation as my work permit also got rejected the first time when I applied online after graduation. He made a really strong case, he took his time and filed for the case and after a very hard time in Canada I finally got my work permit. All thanks to Ashish as I cant be more greatful for it.

Elite's client

Rajender Singh

I would like to take this opportunity to thank Mr. Ashish Chadha and Elite Overseas Services LTD for all there hard work and support in getting my Permanent Resident of Canada status. They were there for me in every step of the way. You can rely on Elite Overseas LTS and they will do everything in their power for a favourable outcome. Thank you for everything you have done for me.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Li

Hello, my name is Li. My wife and I just got our Permanent Residency recently. Thanks for the great service from Ashish and his team, although the processing time was boring, with theor confidential and professional help, we made it anyway. I highly recommend elite overseas immigration service for those who wish to come to wirk, study and live in Canada. Ashish and his team will help you to make your dream come true.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Simranjit Mann

A very big thanks to Mr. Ashish Chadha and Elite overseas staff for getting me and my wife together in Canada. Ashish has been very professional, supportive and patient through the whole spouse work permit and on going PR process. Immigration was a complex process specially with my wife being in India and me in a different city in Canada than Ashish's office. Ashish broke it down into a much more simple and easy to follow process and was always available through different means of communication (Skype, phone, email, text, call). It took only 5 months after my wedding that my wife got her work permit and I was thrilled that she got her visa in just 2 months from the day we submitted the application. He assisted us through all our doubts and questions very professionally and efficiently. Currently Ashish is helping me with the PNP/ Express Entry process and I have never ever stepped in his office once and still the process is buttery smooth. I am happy to recommend him to anyone who needs his services. He helped us, reach closer to our dream of living in Canada together.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Irene Placente

We would like to take this opportunity to thank you deeply for making our dreams came to reality. To become a permanent resident here in Canada.The rest of our family are really happy that we found a person who is righteous, willingly and capable to process our papers to be a permanent resident here and that is you Mr Ashish Chadha. You are a good man. We know that you will help more and more people to achieve their ambitions too. Once again, we are extending our utmost appreciation for assistance you accorded to us. God Bless to your company.

Now Permanent Resident of Canada

Galyna

I would like to thank Elite Overseas Services for all their hard work and support. They were there when it was needed and anticipated every possible move. You can rely on Elite Overseas Services and trust me, they will do anything it takes to help you as much as they can! Thank you all again!

Elite's client

Angie & Nakul Dey

My husband and I were very happy with the service we received from Ashish Chadha at Elite Immigration. He was very knowledgeable, helpful and kind in our process of navigating the immigration system. He was always very attentive and willing to meet with us and give us his time and worked hard to make sure that all of our paperwork was put together smoothly and seamlessly. We really can't thank him enough and couldn't have done it without him. Much gratitude to Ashish and his team.

Elite's client

Ravin Maan

Thank you very much for all the support and assistance provided by you from the start of the procedure till the day I got my Student Visa for Canada. You have truly inspired me to apply for Canada Student Visa with sincerity and dedication. Preparing file was a huge task for me which you did so simply and nicely. It was really good to have regular updates from your side, and providing needed information timely. Again, thanks so much for the Visa assistance, I really appreciate all services provided by you throughout this visa process.

Elite's client

Rhea Razon

It is not easy for everybody to come to a new country as an immigrant. If you face any type of immigration related complications, your worries will be multiplied and can lead to great anxiety. If you can find someone to offer you advice and guidance, this person can be a pathfinder for the rest of your life. There are many Immigration Consultant out there but among them, for me, ASHISH CHADHA is the best. He is someone who really works for you with all of his heart.

Elite's client
